name: Super Adventure Island II
overview: Master Higgins is in a brand new adventure and in more trouble - This guy must be doing something wrong to always be in trouble. He's in the biggest trouble of his life. He's lost his memory and his wife Tina has been kidnapped by an unknown enemy. Only you can help Master Higgins recover his past and rescue his wife. In your adventure, you must travel to islands of fire, ice, and other dangers. You will find specific weapons which are necessary to travel through each of these islands. Find these mighty weapons and test your skill. Also hidden through out these islands are magic bottles. Find these bottles and learn powerful magic spells to help you solve the mysteries of the islands.
